articles.title: "My Gut Says We'll Fight In 2025": US General On War With China - NDTV
articles.description: A four-star US Air Force general said in a memo that his gut told him the United States would fight China in the next two years, comments that Pentagon officials said were not consistent with American military assessments.
articles.content:
The general's views do not represent the Pentagon. (File)

articles.description: UNAIDS says thousands of children are dying from HIV/AIDS because, unlike adults, they do not receive treatment for the deadly disease
articles.content:
GENEVA  The U.N.s main AIDS program says thousands of children are dying from HIV/AIDS because, unlike adults, they do not receive treatment for the deadly disease.
